ComicInfo.Title: Radio Silence
ComicInfo.Series: Amanda Hocking's The Hollows: A Hollowland Graphic Novel
ComicInfo.Summary: America is under attack from zombies -- and Remy King has no idea how to stop it, discovering the truth about her grandparents death while Lazlo Durante hides in his show business bunker. Elsewhere Blue Adams tries to bring help to the people and Harlow Smith learns a terrible secret about her mother! New stories leading up to Amanda Hocking's best selling novel HOLLOWLAND, adapted and enhanced by #1 New York Times bestseller Tony Lee (X-Men Unlimited, Doctor Who), with phenomenal artwork by Steve Uy(Avengers Initiative, JSA Classified)! Dynamite Entertainment proudly presents Amanda Hocking's The Hollows: A Hollowland graphic novel.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-09 14:50:03. [CVDB407313]
